original_text: Jesus answered, “How can the guests of the bridegroom fast while he is with them? They cannot, so long as they have him with them.
korean_text: 예수께서 그들에게 이르시되 혼인 집 손님들이 신랑과 함께 있을 때에 금식할 수 있느냐 신랑과 함께 있을 동안에는 금식할 수 없느니라

sentences.original_text: How can the guests of the bridegroom fast
sentences.korean_translation: 신랑의 손님들이 어떻게 금식할 수 있겠느냐

sentences.original_text: so long as they have him with them.
